# Call Voidling (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]]) \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 7]], [[7th Level Oracle Spells|Oracle 7]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Witch Spells|Witch 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 13]], [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft + 5 ft./2 caster levels)

**Effect:** One summoned [[Voidling|voidling]]

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 139

This spell summons a [[Voidling|voidling]] from the Dark Tapestry. It appears where you designate and acts immediately on your turn. It attacks your opponents to the best of its ability. If you can communicate with the creature, you can direct it not to attack, to attack particular enemies, or to perform other actions. See sidebar on following page for the [[Voidling|voidling]]â€™s statistics.
